Instance.description: A situation used to control the flow of the Kava Party.

TunableTuple.name: _post_kava_served_state
TunableTuple.description: The situation state used during the party after the kava has been served for the first time.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableTuple.name: _pre_kava_served_state
TunableTuple.description: The situation state used at the start of the party, before the kava has been served for the first time.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

TunableList.name: auto_invite_disabled_traits
TunableList.description: A list of traits, that if any one of them is present in the lot traits of a lot will keep the kava party situation from auto inviting locals.

Tunable.description: The lot trait that, if present on the lot, will stop the situation from auto inviting locals to the party.

Tunable.name: guest_job
Tunable.description: The job that guests will use.

Tunable.name: host_job
Tunable.description: The job that the host will use.

Tunable.name: island_guest_job
Tunable.description:
The job that will be used for Islander auto invited to the party.
This needs to be different because it will only filter Island Sims as valid guests, which is different than the regular guest job.

Tunable.name: min_number_of_guests
Tunable.description:
The minimum number of Sims that should show up for a Kava Party, assuming there is enough room in the Sim cap to accommodate them.
If less than this number of Sims is chosen as a guest by the user, then the rest will be filled with random island Sims.
